

* How to upload images to SVN *

1. Checkout Subversion: # svn checkout https://fabfi.googlecode.com/svn/wiki
2. Move to the working directory: # cd wiki/
3. Make a directory in which to save images: ~/wiki# svn mkdir images
   ~/wiki# svn commit
